meaningMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>prohibition</kanji> so the verb version means <vocabulary>to prohibit</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to forbid</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This has the same reading as the kanji you learned, meaning you know the reading!
